data.meta_site_name: CompaniesHistory.com - The largest companies and brands in the world
data.text:
Maxis Berhad profile and corporate video

Maxis Berhad is an investment holding company. The Company, along with its subsidiaries, is a provider of mobile, fixed line and international gateway telecommunications services, as well as Internet and broadband services, and corporate support functions. It operates in four segments: mobile services, which comprises postpaid mobile, prepaid mobile, mobile data, broadband and roaming services; enterprise fixed services, which comprise a suite of voice services, data services, very small aperture terminal services and Internet protocol (IP) and managed services to cater for business customers; international gateway services, which comprises services to international telecommunications carriers for termination of traffic into Malaysia, services to send its own international traffic abroad and bandwidth leasing services, and home services comprise fixed voice services and data services to home customers. In July 2012, Maxis Communications Berhad held 65% interest in the Company.”

*Informations from Forbes.com
